items.name: case fill
items.desc: Indicates to the shape’s style that SwiftUI fills the shape.

items.name: case stroke
items.desc: Indicates to the shape’s style that SwiftUI applies a stroke to the shape’s path.

items.name: case separator
items.desc: Indicates to the shape’s style that SwiftUI uses the shape as a separator.

items.name: static func == (ShapeRole, ShapeRole) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two shape roles are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two shape roles are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the shape role by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the shape role.
